title: What was the most innovative invention for its time? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Wheel. Nothing ever like it had ever been invented or come out before and it ended up revolutionizing transportation which may have been a key reason why civilization came into existence in the first place. The Wheel sparked peoples imagination and demanded that people innovate and create new inventions to accomidate it. The wheel was probably centuries ahead of its time in the big scope of things
